channel.title: I need help loading pictures from a camera to a computer
channel.description: my dad took his laptop and he is going to be away for a few weeks and i need to upload picture. is there any way to get phtoshop for free or something to upload pctures

item.description:
@winston005 wrote:

if you do want photoshop for free though just download it then geta keygen.

item.title: I need help loading pictures from a camera to a computer
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

You don’t need photoshop for that. Just plug your camera into your computer and go to My Computer, and then you will either see a Removable Drive, or maybe your camera’s name. You might have to turn your camera on too when you plug it in.

Read full topic
